title: Philip Mornay, Lord of Plessis his teares For the death of his sonne. Vnto his wife Charlotte Baliste. Englished by Iohn Healey.
author: Mornay, Philippe de, seigneur du Plessis-Marly, 1549-1623.
publisher: Printed by G. Eld, dwelling in Fleete-lane, at the signe of the Printers Presse,
notes: Running title reads: Du Plessis his teares.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
